columns.name: name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the firewall policy.

columns.name: id
columns.description: Contains ID to identify a firewall policy uniquely.

columns.name: etag
columns.description: A unique read-only string that changes whenever the resource is updated.

columns.name: type
columns.description: The resource type of the firewall policy.

columns.name: provisioning_state
columns.description: The provisioning state of the firewall policy resource. Possible values include: 'Succeeded', 'Updating', 'Deleting', 'Failed'.

columns.name: intrusion_detection_mode
columns.description: Intrusion detection general state. Possible values include: 'FirewallPolicyIntrusionDetectionStateTypeOff', 'FirewallPolicyIntrusionDetectionStateTypeAlert', 'FirewallPolicyIntrusionDetectionStateTypeDeny'.

columns.name: sku_tier
columns.description: Tier of Firewall Policy. Possible values include: 'FirewallPolicySkuTierStandard', 'FirewallPolicySkuTierPremium'.

columns.name: threat_intel_mode
columns.description: The operation mode for Threat Intelligence. Possible values include: 'AzureFirewallThreatIntelModeAlert', 'AzureFirewallThreatIntelModeDeny', 'AzureFirewallThreatIntelModeOff'.

columns.name: base_policy
columns.description: The parent firewall policy from which rules are inherited.

columns.name: child_policies
columns.description: List of references to Child Firewall Policies.

columns.name: dns_settings
columns.description: DNS Proxy Settings definition.

columns.name: firewalls
columns.description: List of references to Azure Firewalls that this Firewall Policy is associated with.

columns.name: identity
columns.description: The identity of the firewall policy.

columns.name: intrusion_detection_configuration
columns.description: Intrusion detection configuration properties.

columns.name: rule_collection_groups
columns.description: List of references to FirewallPolicyRuleCollectionGroups.

columns.name: threat_intel_whitelist_ip_addresses
columns.description: List of IP addresses for the ThreatIntel Whitelist.

columns.name: threat_intel_whitelist_fqdns
columns.description: List of FQDNs for the ThreatIntel Whitelist.

columns.name: transport_security_certificate_authority
columns.description: The CA used for intermediate CA generation.

columns.name: title
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTitle

columns.name: tags
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionTags

columns.name: region
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionRegion

columns.name: resource_group
columns.description: ColumnDescriptionResourceGroup
